tasks.title: Implement User Authentication
tasks.description: As a user, I want to be able to sign up, log in, and securely authenticate myself to access my Toto list. This task involves implementing user authentication features using a secure authentication mechanism like OAuth or JWT.

tasks.title: Design UI/UX for Toto Item Creation
tasks.description: Design intuitive and user-friendly interfaces for creating new Toto list items. This includes wireframing and prototyping the user interface, considering factors like ease of use, accessibility, and adherence to design principles.

tasks.title: Develop Toto Item Priority Feature
tasks.description: Implement the ability for users to assign priorities to their Toto list items. Priorities could include categories like high, medium, and low or numerical values. This feature will allow users to better organize and prioritize their tasks based on urgency and importance.
